abstract: intertek group given buy rating at jefferies group .
article: intertek group 's stock had its `` buy '' rating reiterated by investment analysts at jefferies group in a research report issued on monday , december 11th . they currently have a gbx 5,300 price target on the stock . jefferies group 's price objective points to a potential upside of 2.61 % from the stock 's previous close . a number of other equities research analysts also recently commented on itrk . credit suisse group restated an `` underperform '' rating and issued a gbx 4,520 price target on shares of intertek group in a report on thursday , november 23rd .

kepler capital markets restated a `` hold '' rating and issued a gbx 5,190 price target on shares of intertek group in a report on wednesday , november 22nd . barclays increased their price target on intertek group from gbx 4,350 to gbx 4,750 and gave the stock an `` equal weight '' rating in a report on wednesday , november 22nd . jpmorgan chase & co. . increased their price target on intertek group from gbx 4,763 to gbx 5,646 and gave the stock an `` overweight '' rating in a report on wednesday , november 22nd . finally , shore capital restated a `` sell '' rating on shares of intertek group in a report on tuesday , november 21st .

four equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , ten have issued a hold rating and two have assigned a buy rating to the stock . the company currently has a consensus rating of `` hold '' and an average target price of gbx 4,371.86 . shares of intertek group traded down gbx 10 on monday , hitting gbx 5,165 . the stock had a trading volume of 87,690 shares , compared to its average volume of 409,725 . intertek group has a twelve month low of gbx 3,370 and a twelve month high of gbx 5,470 .
